name: KORG DSN-12
description:
KORG DSN-12 software makes it
easy for anyone to enjoy serious
sound-creation and song production
with analog synthesizers. The software
provides 12 monophonic synthesizers.
Each one lets you add 3 effects,
allowing a broad range of powerful
sounds that you would not expect
from a game machine. You can make
your ideas take shape very quickly,
you can enjoy constructing songs in
real time while performing in a DJ-like
manner. Don't miss the world's first
3D display oscilloscope screen!
